nodes.text: This type of transport was seen to be used by Naboo civilians during the Invasion of Naboo in the year 32 BBY.
The transport was square-shaped with two little fins on the side of the engine, it was colored red and white and maneuvered on repulsors.

The design of the vehicle was created for the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo, appearing in the second level, "Neimoidian Plunder", and in the fourth level, "Smuggler Alliance".
